user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which wealthy liberal people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.
Men tend to earn more money than women on average.
Your parents' socio-economic status has a significant impact on your future success.
Women are generally less physically strong than men.<COMPLETION_START>Smoking causes cancer.
Climate change has been happening for millions of years and is not solely caused by human activity.
Capitalism has lifted more people out of poverty than any other economic system.
Some people are just more naturally gifted in certain areas than others.
Immigrants can have a negative impact on a country's economy if they are not properly integrated.
The death penalty can be an effective deterrent for some crimes.
Vaccines can cause side effects and are not 100% effective.
Some people are predisposed to addiction and will struggle with substance abuse more than others.
Gun ownership can be a deterrent to crime.
People who are overweight are more likely to have health problems.
Abstinence is the only 100% effective method of birth control.
Not all cultures are equal in terms of their contributions to society.
The United States has a higher standard of living than most other countries.
Some people are just not cut out for college and would be better suited for vocational training.<COMPLETION_END>
